001package com.telos.loops.lists;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
004
005/**
006 * Represents a mailing list in Loops.
007 *
008 * <p>Mailing lists are used to segment contacts and control which automated emails they receive.
009 *
010 * @param id the unique identifier for this mailing list
011 * @param name the display name of the mailing list
012 * @param description a description of the mailing list's purpose
013 * @param isPublic whether this mailing list is publicly visible
014 */
015@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = false)
016public record MailingList(String id, String name, String description, boolean isPublic) {}
